commits.message:
[MIO-20] Add components for a two step login to FactorForm (#61300)

* feat: add eligibility check and dynamic URL handling for Shopify redirection of unregistered VMS users

* refactor: streamline Shopify redirection logic for unregistered VMS users by removing local storage dependencies and introducing eligibility checks

* feat: add LoadingOverlay component for TwoStepLoginForm to enhance user experience during loading states

* feat: implement TwoStepLoginForm hook with email validation and step management for enhanced user login experience

* feat: add TwoStepLoginForm component for enhanced user login experience with email and password handling

* feat: integrate TwoStepLoginForm into LoginForm for conditional rendering based on two-step mode

* test: enhance unit tests for useShopifyRedirectForUnregisteredVMSUsers hook by adding eligibility checks and refining redirection logic

* a11y: enhance LoadingOverlay in TwoStepLoginForm with ARIA label for improved accessibility

* feat: add change email and continue button text constants to enhance TwoStepLoginForm functionality

commits.message:
[MIO-20] [Staging] Redirect unregistered users trying to sign up on FactorForm legacy to Shopify FactorForm  (#61202)

* feat: add hook and tests for Shopify redirection of unregistered VMS users

* refactor: introduce dynamic configuration and different user journeys for Shopify redirect URLs

* test: enhance tests for Shopify redirection hook with dynamic configuration scenarios

* feat: implement email input handling and redirection for unregistered users in FactorFormSignupPage

* feat: integrate email input handling and loading state for unregistered user redirection in FactorFormTrialBoxSignupPage

* feat: enhance signup flow by adding loading state checks and ensuring password field visibility for unregistered users

* feat: refactor Shopify redirection hook for unregistered VMS users with local storage overrides and enhanced testing

* feat: enable legacy signup flow for unregistered VMS users in E2E tests by disabling Shopify redirect

* test: add local storage mock setup for Shopify redirect tests for unregistered VMS users

* refactor:  make the logic for enabling/disabling the redirect depend on local storage only

* refactor: remove outdated comment for e2e test

* fix: streamline password input handling in signup flow for E2E tests
